ratings.comment: I would give this professor a negative 7 stars if I could. He is a boring lecturer. He talks at like 1/4 the speed of a normal person and does not teach you anything that will be on his exams. His exams did not reflect the lecture material or discussion material. 80% of our class failed his exam.

The worst class I've taken at UW. Lectures are insanely confusing. He does not explain any of the material in any significant way. Test had absolutely nothing to do with the lectures. Goes over the easiest question in a section and moves on. I understand the transition to online is probably tough, but this was a horrible excuse of a class.

I have never been so bored or confused in lectures. He explains absolutely nothing. In fact, I would just watch khan academy or something during lecture because that's probably a better use of your time. All I can say is good luck. This class is horrible. I miss Daniel Thurs.

Horrible professor. Horrible explanations. Horrible class. Physics is supposed to be like a fun math class, but he makes the tests unlike any of the problems you will see. Honestly, there's no point to studying for these exams because there's nothing you can do to prepare. get ready for curve balls- tests aren't a reflection of learning at all....

He made the exams way harder than ive ever seen. and he didnt care that people that did amazing on the first exam (made by a different professor) failed the second exam(one by McDermott). dosent care about you or your grade, cares about making the class rediculously hard for no reason at all. the exam was nothing i had seen before or knew how to do

So horribly bad at explaining things it's actually crazy. Not sure how he expects anyone to be prepared for exams. Goes over one problem for 10 minutes that does not even look like anything on an exam.

Horrible. He took over for Professor Thurs which is really a bummer because now the lectures are ridiculously dry, boring, and confusing. He will not explain anything well. Does not prepare you well for the exams at all. Worst professor I have had at UW Madison.

McDermott himself isn't a bad professor, but I personally did not enjoy this course. I tend to read the textbook for my main learning and try to supplement it with lecture, but that did not fly at all here. The textbook was borderline useless. So,attend his lectures rigorously and forget about the reading. However, you will need the book for the HW
Awesome professor. Very clear about material and has extremely helpful lectures. Even ended up working for the guy!
Wouderfull lectures. Clear and very interesting always.
Class and lab are kind of boring.  Has a great sense of humor.
